body.name: Baby Trend Sit N Stand Easy Fold Double Baby Stroller and Single Infant Car Seat Travel System with Safety Harnesses and Cover, Stormy
features: Baby Travel Bundle: Bundle includes the 1 Infant and Toddler Sit N Stand Double Twin Stroller and 1 Car Seat; Use the rear seat as a standing platform for ultimate convenience
Stroller and Car Seat Dimensions: Stroller measures 49 inches long, 21.5 inches wide, and 43 inches tall; Car seat measures 27 inches long, 18.5 inches wide, and 25 inches tall
Travel System Compatible: The double stroller's front and rear seats can accept up to 2 infant car seats; Compatible with the included Baby Trend Infant Car Seat
Infant Car Seat: Car seat accommodates weights between 4 to 35 pounds and up to 30 inches tall; Includes a deluxe seat pad, and reversible infant insert specially designed to cradle the child
Car Seat Features: Features 5-point safety harnesses with 1-hand adjustment and height-adjustable seat back; Designed with safety features like EPS energy-absorbing foam and an adjustable canopy
body.description: The Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller and Car Seat bundle is the perfect solution for making family on-the-go travel seamless. This convenient Baby trend Stroller allows you to take your babies wherever you desire to go without leaving them behind. With the stroller's exceptional features and construction, you will never worry about your baby's safety. This versatile double stroller has multiple seating options that can accommodate up to 2 Baby Trend infant car seats by quickly clicking them directly into the child's tray. The front seat of this Baby Trend Double Stroller has a removable 2-panel fully ratcheting canopy, and the rear seat has a fixed canopy with visors to block the sun. Including a hassle-free 1 hand fold, an extra-large basket for all your traveling necessities, and a parent console with 2 cup holders with a covered compartment, you'll be able to travel with everything you need for a perfect day with this double stroller with car seat. For little ones weighing up to 35 pounds and 32 inches long, the infant car seat features a 5-point safety harness with a simple 1-hand adjustment and push-button release, 4-position height adjustment, and a height-adjustable seat back for a secure and snug fit. Ensure your child's ultimate safety while traveling and keep them safe and sound with the Baby Trend Sit N Stand Easy Fold Travel Double Baby Stroller and Single Infant Car Seat Travel System.

The Baby Trend Ally 35 Infant Car Seat provides the latest innovations in safety, design and comfort. This infant car seat has a 35 pound maximum infant weight rating and comes equipped with a deluxe seat pad and reversible infant insert. For added security, Ally 35 is engineered with higher, deeper side wings with EPS foam for optimal side impact protection. Other safety features include a 5-point safety harness with one-hand adjustment, a 4-position height adjustable base with dual bubble level indicators and a 6-position crotch belt adjustment.
4-position height adjustable base with dual bubble level indicators

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's coming in handy
reviews.reviewText: When I first received this stroller and car seat I was going to take it back because it doesn't fit in my trunk easily. If you're upgrading from a one baby stroller to a twin stroller please remember It's bigger than the picture shows. It's like trying to maneuver a train or a bus It's just very big so if you can handle a bigger item definitely get this I think it's worth it. I have a 2015 Chevrolet Equinox so the trunk isn't massive But still I expected the stroller to fit and without me having to fight with it everyday. However I give it five stars because for me personally it's coming handy I do have two kids under the age of 6 months so I need it. But besides that I have a daughter requires oxygen so whenever I don't have the other baby with me keeping the oxygen and all the medical equipment in the first seat is really helpful and when I have both of the babies I'll just have the oxygen on my back and have both babies in the stroller.Now for the more negative part of this review The area for the baby bag is definitely not big enough so if the baby bag storage compartment is important to you then you would really like the stroller but if you're looking for a stroller with a compartment that's going to hold a pretty good decent sized baby bag this isn't probably the one for you When I have both the babies in the stroller Putting a baby bag in between the two is just it's nearly impossible. Other than that it's a good buy. And I definitely absolutely 100% love the car seat that comes with it The main reason I didn't return the stroller because it's so massive is because I fell in love with the car seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Bad For The Price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It comes with a car seat!!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I have a 3 year old and a new baby coming November. I seen so many reviews saying they thought it came with a car seat and it does. I received the stroller first,2 days early then I contacted the seller about the car seat due to reviews I seen and they responded the same day and gave me a tracking number for FedEx and the car seat came at the estimated time it had originally said. So just two days later. They where very responsive and polite. Also it's very big but it's a double stroller, so I'm fine with the size. Overall great product. I just wanted everyone to know your stroller and car seat ships separate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this Double Stroller car seat combo in hopes that it would make my life easier with a toddler and newborn… Boy was I wrong, the quality of the stroller is terrible. I’ve had multiple issues with the wheels and the reclining ability on the front seat. Likewise the stroller just seems to fall apart every time I use it now, sometimes a wheel falls off while pulling it out to use and now the rubber is ripping around the handle area. Typically I have my newborn in the front in his car seat and for some odd reason the red safety straps will not secure down the car seat. In regards to the stroller being “lightweight” it certainly is not and is pretty difficult to fit in most vehicles. Furthermore, the stroller does NOT have a lot of storage underneath and certainly serves more as a foot space. It is extremely inconvenient and difficult to even fit one bag in the storage area. Overall I’m disappointed in this stroller and regret my purchase. I would rather have 2 single strollers or seek other options with a different brand. I’m even more disappointed and upset with the BabyTrend customer service. I reached out initially in the beginning of September in regards to my issues in hopes for a replacement or fix and it took 4 weeks to even receive a response… then after going back and forth for another 3 1/2 weeks they told me I needed to SHIP the HUGE stroller in to be reviewed for “repair” and stated they weren’t responsible for certain things and it pretty much needed to be disassembled to the bare to be sent to their warehouse because if something like a tray got lost they wouldn’t be responsible. Needless to say I am unable to return the item due to their lack of communication, since I am now out of the return window. Also, I will not be spending my own money for a large box to send the stroller in for repair, that is such a inconvenience. What. A. Mistake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!
reviews.reviewText: I love this double stroller so much! I am a huge fan of the durability of baby trend products! They don't break the bank and last a long time! If you don't have trunk space I wouldn't get this but for those who have space for it I would say get it because you won't regret it!
